title: Manual on Recurring Problems in Criminal Trials, Fifth Edition
abstract:
Manual on Recurring Problems
in Criminal Trials
Fifth Edition
Federal Judicial Center 2001
By Honorable Donald S. Voorhees
United States District Judge
Western District of Washington
Seattle, Washington
Edited by
Genevra Kay Loveland
Revised to include cases decided during the Supreme Court’s
2000–2001 term and United States Court of Appeals cases
reported through 212 F.3d 306
This Federal Judicial Center publication was undertaken in furtherance of
the Center’s statutory mission to develop and
